price: ߊ߬ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߌ߬ߙߌ߲߬ߘߌ ߸ ߒ ߛߌߟߊ߲ߣߍ߲߫ ߊߟߎ߫ ߘߌ߫ ߢߐ߲߯ ߜߋߟߋ߲ߜߋߟߋ߲ ߟߏ߲ ߠߋ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: وَيَٰقَوۡمِ إِنِّيٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيۡكُمۡ يَوۡمَ ٱلتَّنَادِ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayāqawmi innī akhāfu ʿalaykum yawma al-tanādi
